short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use system font on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to apply System Fonts to the internet. Use San Francisco on macOS and Segoe UI on Windows 10 for the best legibility when you need to read, or on other sites with unfavorable font choices.
